column1: The '''East-mark''' was one of the three military divisions of [[Rohan]]
column3: and the King's Lands around [[Edoras]]. The East-mark was defined as those lands that lay east of the [[Entwash]] and [[Snowbourn]] rivers. In military matters
column4: the command of the [[Men]] of the East-mark would be given to one of Rohan's Marshals of the Riddermark. At the time of the [[War of the Ring]] this was the [[Third Marshal of the Riddermark|Third Marshal]]
column6: who held his command at the ancient township of [[Aldburg]]
column7: the original capital of Rohan and the seat of his family.<ref>{{UT|Isen}}
